title: Is there a fix to the Android 10 connectivity issue yet?
content: I have gone through every thing that the Google Fi people suggested and nothing works. When I plug into any computer (Windows 10, WIndows 7 Pro, and Fedora 30 have been tried) there is an error message that says the USB device has malfunctioned. Functioned just fine since purchasing the phone and started as soon as Android 10 got installed (three days ago).
